mapper.delete: DELETE FROM t_user_follow WHERE from_iuser=#{fromIuser} and to_iuser=#{toIuser}
mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(B.iuser) AS feedCnt , A.nm,A.created_at AS createdAt , A.pic , COUNT(C.ifeed) AS favCnt , (SELECT count(*) FROM t_user_follow WHERE from_iuser = #{targetIuser}) AS FOLLOWING , (SELECT count(*) FROM t_user_follow WHERE to_iuser = #{loginedIuser}) AS follower , (SELECT (SUM(if(from_iuser=#{targetIuser} AND to_iuser=#{loginedIuser},1,0)) +SUM(if(from_iuser=#{loginedIuser} AND to_iuser=#{targetIuser},2,0))) FROM t_user_follow )AS followState FROM t_user A LEFT JOIN t_feed B ON A.iuser=B.iuser LEFT JOIN t_feed_fav C ON B.ifeed=C.ifeed LEFT JOIN t_user_follow D ON D.to_iuser=A.iuser WHERE A.iuser=#{targetIuser};
